name: Real Truck Hill Road Climb
description:
Real Truck Hill Road Climb!!!
Drive offroad cargo truck to explore hilly environment and test your mountain driving skills. Driving on hills, mountains and steep paths is a real driving challenge in off-road cargo truck driver simulator. Operate trailer truck to transport cargo and become a real legend truck transporter.
Features:

- Stunning HD graphics
- Realistic truck control
- Select control between steering, arrows and accelerometer
- Amazing sound effects
- Multiple camera view and angles
- Dangerous road
- Truck optimization
